page.title: 04Traffic Survey - Part2
page.content:
The group decided it would be a worthwhile exercise to conduct a smaller traffic survey of movemnet in and out of Tempsford and flow of traffic through Tempsford north and south bound on the A1.The following is a table of results taken from 11.00a.m. to 12.00 noon Thursday June 13th 1985. {A1 South bound traffic. {Cars Lorries Coach/B Peds Bikes. 452 130 4 3 0
{A1 North bound traffic. {Cars Lorries Coach/B Peds Bikes. 315 121 5 2 4 Even though this was not peak traffic times the survey showed just how busy the dual carriage way is.A constant stream of cars and goods vehicles passing up and down the A1 straight through Tempsford.
